Package com.example.lotteryevent.repository

Interface IEntrantListRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
EntrantListRepositoryImpl
public interface IEntrantListRepository
This class defines the contract for repositories responsible for retrieving entrant data and sending notifications related to events. Implementations of this interface provide asynchronous access to entrant lists via LiveData as well as methods to notify individual entrants with organizer-generated messages.

  • Method Details

    • fetchEntrantsByStatus

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> fetchEntrantsByStatus(String eventId, String status)
      Retrieves a list of entrants belonging to a specific event whose status matches the provided value. The results are delivered asynchronously through a LiveData stream so UI components can observe changes without manually accessing the data source.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique identifier of the event for which entrants are being fetched
      status - the status filter used to determine which entrants should be returned (accepted, waiting, cancelled, invited)
      Returns:
      a LiveData object containing a list of entrants that match the requested status

    • fetchAllEntrants

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> fetchAllEntrants(String eventId)
      Retrieves a list of all entrants belonging to a specific event. The results are delivered asynchronously through a LiveData stream. Used specifically for Entrant Map
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique identifier of the event for which entrants are being fetched
      Returns:
      a LiveData object containing a list of all entrants belonging to the specified event

    • notifyEntrant

      void notifyEntrant(String uid, String eventId, String organizerMessage)
      Sends a single entrant a notification message associated with a specific event. The underlying implementation is responsible for preparing the message, retrieving any required metadata, and dispatching the notification through the appropriate notification system.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the entrant to notify
      eventId - the unique identifier of the event associated with the notification
      organizerMessage - the custom text content that the event organizer wishes to send to the entrant

    • getUserMessage

      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<String> getUserMessage()
      LiveData for user-facing messages
      Returns:
      String with message

    • setUserMessage

      void setUserMessage(String message)
      Allows organizer to set a custom message
      Parameters:
      message - set by the organizer

    • updateEntrantStatus

      void updateEntrantStatus(String eventId, String userId, String newStatus, IEntrantListRepository.StatusUpdateCallback callback, boolean sendNotif)
      Updates the status of a specific entrant (e.g., from "invited" to "waiting").
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID.
      userId - The entrant's user ID.
      newStatus - The new status to set.
      callback - A callback to handle success/failure in the ViewModel.
      sendNotif - boolean to indicate whether to notify user of a specific status change
